metadata.title: SoloBoard - All-in-One Dashboard for Solopreneurs
metadata.description: Monitor traffic, revenue, and site health for all your SaaS products in one unified dashboard. Connect Google Analytics, Stripe, Shopify, and more. Free for up to 2 sites.
metadata.keywords: saas dashboard, multi-site monitoring, solopreneur tools, business analytics, stripe dashboard, google analytics dashboard, shopify analytics, unified dashboard, saas metrics, indie hacker tools
